Sanggupkah Anggun menghadapi perlakuan zalim abang beserta suaminya?

programme.title: Cewek Bucin Dapat Gift Cinta
programme.desc: Farel dalam misi mencari kebenaran tentang Jenny. Dia berpura-pura menjadi orang kaya untuk memenangi hati Jenny. Apa yang berlaku seterusnya?

programme.title: 32 Hari Titik! Sa Ae Mbok Cantik
programme.desc: Disebabkan perkahwinan yang diatur dengan Kevin, Siska menyamar sebagai pembantu rumah di rumah Kevin. Dia berniat untuk mengetahui sifat sebenar lelaki itu, tetapi Kevin sentiasa membuat emosi Siska terganggu.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep13
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep272
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep273
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep39
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Penderitaan Penjual Nasi Cokot Yang Dizalimi Keluarga Sendiri
programme.desc: Anggun terpaksa menelan pahit ketika wang yang diperoleh sebagai pekerja migran digunakan oleh abang dan suaminya untuk keperluan peribadi. Dika, adik Anggun bersama ibunya, harus hidup dengan kesulitan. Anggun pulang untuk merawat ibu dan Dika dengan menjual nasi cokot. Namun, abangnya terus menzalimi Anggun. Sanggupkah Anggun menghadapi perlakuan zalim abang beserta suaminya?

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep31
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: LIDA 2021 Ep56
programme.desc: LIDA 2021 ialah rancangan hiburan Dangdut terbesar dan no 1 di Indonesia. LIDA 2021 merupakan musim keempat Liga Dangdut Indonesia dan pemenang musim ini juga dijangka menjadi generasi dangdut Indonesia seterusnya.

programme.title: Infotainment Awards 2022
programme.desc: SCTV sekali lagi mengadakan "Infotainment Awards". Sejumlah selebriti terkenal menerima anugerah untuk pelbagai pencapaian mereka di Infotainment Awards 2022. Acara ini merupakan perayaan kecemerlangan, dengan pelbagai kategori mengiktiraf sumbangan luar biasa dalam industri hiburan. Wajah-wajah terkenal turut memeriahkan acara tersebut, termasuk juga yang menerima penghargaan atas persembahan dan pencapaian luar biasa mereka.

programme.title: Ilhami Ep9
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari realiti mengenai orang-orang yang memberikan inspirasi hidup walaupun menghadapi cabaran.

programme.title: Pacaran Sama Bos? Bahaya Bos
programme.desc: Yoga dan Lisa dijodohkan. Yoga menyuruh pemandunya, Didin untuk menyamar manakala Lisa menyuruh pembantu rumahnya untuk menyamar. Wati yang merupakan pembantu rumah Yoga juga merasa tertipu. Ternyata Yoga dan Lisa sebenarnya saling menyukai. Bagaimanakah nasib Didin dan Wati?

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep32
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep12
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: The King's Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: The Moon

programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Lets share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: Warm Inn Ep3
programme.desc: The host Jiang Mengjie runs a "Warm Inn" which is located in the Jiangnan countryside and far away from the city. She invites a celebrity guest and their friends to visit her in each episode. Guests in the village can have a new exploration experience and immerse themselves in a different kind of Jiangnan. They are assisting with rural revitalization and enjoying a warm healing journey together.

programme.title: The Melody of You (Live) Ep2
programme.desc: The Melody of You (Live)

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep21
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Classical Pieces As My Guide Ep6
programme.desc: Luo Yizhou, Linghe Zhang, Xiaolong Zhang, David Wang, Dylan Wang, Jenny Zeng are invited to the creation place of masterpieces handed down from generation to generation. The connotation is expressed in a modern way, highlighting the continuation and inheritance of Chinese civilization.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep19
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep200
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1035
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep21
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4842
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1902
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3418
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2872
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1035
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep3
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep273274
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: 2024 Pingtung Spring Music Festival (M) Ep1
programme.desc: The Pingtung Spring Music Festival is an annual event taking place every April in Pingtung, Taiwan. This year's lineup boasts even more prominent artists than before! With the theme of 'music, passion, and celebration,' the festival utilizes a variety of personalized emoticons to present rhythmic and captivating music, aiming to forge unforgettable memories with music enthusiasts in Pingtung.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home (M) Ep34
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Golden Chickensss
programme.desc: Ah Kam is now a mama-san leading a team of young prostitutes to service the rich and famous, and she always aims to fulfil every clients needs. When Ah Kams ex-lover, a triad boss, encounters difficulties adapting to a new Hong Kong after his release from a long imprisonment, she helps him get back on his feet to lead a normal life.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Baos wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yangs into battle to continue their husbands legacy.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Fab5 Mission Tango - New Episodes Ep16
programme.desc: Hi-5 to the FAB 5! The gang who set off on a number of adventures around the world fo fulfill their missions.

programme.title: Hagola Ep12
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep13
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Devdas

programme.title: Chalte Chalte

programme.title: Shimla Mirchi
programme.desc: Avi writes an anonymous love letter to Naina, the love of his life. However, things go awry when it lands in her mother's hand and she thinks it is meant for her.

programme.title: Mental
programme.desc: A young boy, who is jailed for killing his mother's murderers, realizes the power of the uniform and grows up into a ruthless but honest cop. Trouble arises when he locks horns with a powerful goon.

programme.title: Shriman Shrimati
programme.desc: A rich and wealthy couple, Shankarlal and Parvati are horrified at the household problems prevalent around them. As a result, they decide to fix these broken families one at a time.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep25

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Campers All Pull Pants - Someone is pulling down the pants of all the campers, and Lazlo is terrified that he might be next!

programme.desc: Meatman - The Jelly Beans create a doll out of canned meat that comes to life and terrorizes the camp.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S2 Ep4

programme.desc: Ready Teddy / Swiss Cuckoo / Dream Team / Private Tom - Spike's teddy bear is accidentally ruined & Tom dreams of a basketball championship.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Parasitic Pal - Lazlo gets a new best friend. It's not another camper but a parasitic leech that is stuck to his head!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep2
programme.desc: It's No Picnic - The Bean Scouts and the Squirrel Scouts settle their mud puddle squabble during a 'friendly' picnic.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Weakest Link - The campers send the Jelly Beans on a 'wild goose chase' so they won't bungle the camp inspection!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lumpy Treasure - A bunch of mosquito bites forms a treasure map on Raj's behind, and the Jellies hunt for a secret treasure!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lights Out - Lumpus can't get the Jelly Beans to turn their lights out!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Swimming Buddy - Lazlo helps Raj prepare for the camp swimming test, but Raj is terrified of even the tiniest drop of water!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Tree Hugger - Lumpus and Lazlo butt heads when they both try to catch the elusive 'Migrating Mullberry' tree, which only visits this region once every 100 years.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Marshmallow Jones - Lazlo's friendship with Raj suffers because Raj has only one thing on his mind: marshmallows!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Gone Fishin' (Sort Of) - Scoutmaster Lumpus is determined to finally catch a fish, and he certainly doesn't need the Jelly Beans to help him reel one in. Or does he?

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Beans Are From Mars - The Squirrel Scouts discover that the Jelly Beans are actually from another planet and take them hostage to find out more.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Dosey Doe - Lazlo organizes a dance with the Squirrel Scouts so that Lumpus can spend time with Jane Doe, but when the big night arrives, Lumpus is so nervous that his body literally explodes from fear.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Prodigious Clamus - Lumpus discovers that Clam is not only a child genius, but he's also Lumpus' meal ticket to a life of fame and fortune!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Nothing Club - When Edward excludes Lazlo from his secret club, Lazlo creates his own club out of nothing!

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Loogie Llama - The Bean Scouts feel lousy because they don't have horses, but that all changes when Lazlo calls in a spitting llama who reminds them all it's okay to be a misfit.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Snake Eyes - When the Jelly Beans lose their new pet snake in their cabin, Patsy shows up to save the campers from being swallowed one by one by the vicious little garter snake.

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep16

programme.title: Camp Lazlo S1 Ep17

programme.title: Batman: The Doom That Came To Gotham
programme.desc: This chilling and bizarre DC Elseworlds story is a mash-up of the world of Batman and the cosmic-horror fiction of H.P. Lovecraft, creator of the Cthulhu mythos. Returning from a decade-long voyage of discovery, Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham City, where his parents fell victim to the knife of a madman 20 years earlier. On his journey, Bruce has taken on an international trio of orphaned street kids whom Batman fans will recognize as various iterations of Robin. During a deadly Arctic encounter, the Penguin informs Bruce that a doomsday cult is planning Gotham's destruction. Bruce must now return home and take on the mantle of Batman. But when this man of science discovers he faces not criminals and crazies but actual ancient magic, fiery demons and interdimensional Old Gods, can he retain his sanity?

programme.title: ALF S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Someone To Watch Over Me, Part II - Willie tries to save ALF from the SWAT team before they storm the house. Trapped, ALF uses multiple voices to make the police think the mystery burglar has taken hostages.

programme.title: ALF S2 Ep17
programme.desc: We Gotta Get Out Of This Place - ALF tries to be a "seeing-eye alien" for his blind friend, Jody, whom he invites to live in his home when her building is under renovation. To avoid imposing on the Tanners, Jody soon finds a place of her own.

programme.title: ALF S2 Ep18
programme.desc: You Ain't Nothin' But A Hound Dog - Ethel responds to the Tanners' advertisement about a lost dog that Brian brought home, but the Tanners are convinced that it belongs to someone else. They're proven right when a young Hannah shows up.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Art for Sam's Sake - Eudora substitutes a masterpiece for one of Samantha's paintings.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Charlie Harper, Winner - An old-rivalry upsets Darrin, but Samantha proves he's a winner after all.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Aunt Clara's Victoria Victory - Larry almost loses an important client when Aunt Clara conjures up Queen Victoria.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Crone of Cawdor - Unless Samantha can prevent Darrin from kissing a pretty girl, he will age five hundred years.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S3 Ep07
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Spanish Chest - Poirot is asked to protect a woman from her violent husband, but events take a turn when the husband soon becomes the victim of a gruesome murder.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S3 Ep08
programme.desc: The Theft of the Royal Ruby - Poirot reluctantly agrees to help an Egyptian prince recover a valuable royal ruby that was brazenly stolen from him during the Christmas holidays.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S3 Ep09
programme.desc: The Affair at the Victory Ball - Poirot and Hastings attend the Victory Ball, a popular costume party. During the festivities, one of the guests is found stabbed to death, and another succumbs to a drug overdose the next day.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep04
programme.desc: But I Didn't Shoot The Deputy - Like any red-blooded American, when Al hears a strange sound in the night, he springs to the defense of his home and family and accidentally shoots the neighbors dog.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Have You Driven A Ford Lately? - After Al and Steve restore a 65 Mustang to its former glory, Marcy and Steve cant resist giving it a test run - from the back seat.

programme.title: Married... With Children S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Whose Room Is It Anyway? - When Steve and Marcy decide to add on to their house, Al and Peggy have them squabbling over an exercise salon for the girls or a poolroom for the guys.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep1
programme.desc: It's 2016, and as CEO of NYL, Massimo Ruggero has brought Chinese investors onto the board and needs to win big on the Brexit referendum.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep2
programme.desc: As Massimo and his team vow to discover the truth behind Brexit's tragic aftermath, Dominic tries to stop NYL from acquiring a social media app.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep3
programme.desc: As Massimo's suspicions over Wu Zhi and Liwei grow, Oliver discovers that his chance of a future outside NYL has been sabotaged.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The battle lines are drawn between NYL and Dominic's new company - with former colleagues and friends pitted against one another.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep5
programme.desc: An accident outside a private Mayfair bank creates a once in a lifetime opportunity to discover the creator of Bitcoin.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Now knowing that he is a target, Massimo tires to retrieve the stolen evidence against him and creates a new plan to protect Europe and its citizens.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep7
programme.desc: In the final battle of the data war, Massimo has to finalise a new 5G deal with the EU and face the true threat to democracy.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep8
programme.desc: After years in exile, Massimo sees the opportunity presented by the COVID-19 pandemic to finally get justice.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, shes in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: Her Deadly Boyfriend
programme.desc: After breaking up with her perfect-on-paper boyfriend, Sadie is swept off her feet by the rebellious bad boy Gavin. But soon, she discovers dating a bad boy isnt just exciting... its dangerous.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Super Eruption

programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. programme.desc: Emperor - Emperor penguins battle for survival against the worst winter in the world. Working together can they protect and feed their chicks till they reach adulthood?

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Taurus Mountains to Istanbul - In the Taurus Mountains, Simon stays with descendants of the original Turks, nomads known as Yoruks, whose lifestyle is under threat from the modern world and an increasingly Islamic government.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tornadoes tear through Texas, rip tides trap swimmers in Florida, a storm hits holiday makers in Greece and a wave crashes through a restaurant in Italy.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep5
programme.desc: This Hallowe'en special looks at factories producing bubble gum eyeballs, monster-themed chocolate bars, toffee apples and molasses sweets.

programme.desc: Discover why a hot house is essential to growing the sweetest tomatoes; how a 130 foot tunnel oven makes perfect muffins; the secret recipe for Breathsavers candy; and how today's machines can make the best gnocchi in only ten minutes!

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patterned Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep12

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dark - The dark, a world of opportunity for mammals. More than two-thirds prefer the cover of the night, with some now returning to the safety of the shadows in order to avoid us.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S2 Ep5
programme.desc: We open the doors to one of the world's most advanced electric taxis. How do American footballs withstand the equivalent force of 200 newtons? In France, a cosmetic line relies on high tech robotic automation and China continues to produce a childhood favourite in epic proportions.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.desc: Destroyer of Worlds - When spring finally arrives in Alaska, the landscape and waterways come back to life with a vengeance as the snow and ice melt.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon joins an Aussie rancher to round up camels using a specially-adapted off road vehicle and a chopper.

programme.title: The Persians - A History of Iran S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Samira Ahmed reveals how Iran preserved its distinctive language and culture despite the Arab conquest of Persia.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patterned Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Changing Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We begin the launch of the BBC's ambitious seven-year natural history project, in which six presenters visit six of the planet's most threatened ecosystems to meet the people fighting to restore the Earth's delicate balance. In this first episode, Steve Backshall, Chris Packham and Ella Al-Shamahi visit the Maldives, Iceland and Cambodia.

programme.title: Changing Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin travels to California to learn about the increasing wildfires. Ade Adepitan travels to Kenya to look at rising climate temperatures, and Gordon Buchanan is in Brazil looking for jaguars.

programme.title: Climate Change: Ade On The Frontline S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bangladesh and Bhutan - In Bangladesh and Bhutan, Ade sees the damage that climate change is causing and finds out how we can fight it - and how a whole country can go carbon negative.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Humpback Birth of a Giant Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the first months of a newborn humpback whales life in the waters off the Pacific Coast of Columbia. See how his mother nurtures him through sickness, supports his body, protects him under attack, and prepares him for an epic journey.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. Its turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Punks on the Run Ep3
programme.desc: The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Road to Independence Ep4
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Fugitive Giants Ep4
programme.desc: With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Koala Country Ep1
programme.desc: Despite being one of Australias best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2
programme.desc: The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 - Meet the Devils Ep1
programme.desc: For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials mealtime.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Rick's in Falmouth, seeing the seas around Cornwall which inspired author William Golding to write Lord of the Flies, and meets his daughter, Judy. And Rick gets to enjoy dishes prepared for him by an innovative young chef called Andy Tuck who cooks everything over wood - forget your BBQ, this is cooking with fire on a whole new level.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Biscuit Week - The competition kicks off with Biscuit Week, and the bakers are challenged to make biscuits that will say something both about them and a place in the British Isles.

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie cooks three one-pan recipes that provide a perfect solution for busy life: a super-fast, flavour-packed smoky noodle soup; the cleverest homemade bread in a pan; and a chicken & mushroom pie with a time-saving tip for perfect pastry.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rick Stein reaches the mid-point of his meander through France as he continues exploring Burgundy and practises a little entente cordiale with a chateau owner.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Curry Night - Jamie creates a vegetarian feast with an array of fragrant dishes, including a coconut squash curry, beautifully fried golden paneer and a smoky aubergine dal, finished off with minted mango fro-yos.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: San Sebastian - Nisha Katona takes Fred to San Sebastian for a mind-blowing meal at one of the world's top restaurants, and to visit a tiny sports bar to learn the secrets of the perfect tortilla.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Swinton Estate, Yorkshire - Monica and Giles work behind the scenes at one of England's historic country estates, which the ancestral owners, Lord and Lady Masham, have opened up to guests.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Retiree Dennis and part-time school worker Christine had always dreamed of living by the sea in a place big enough to host their large family.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep6
programme.desc: North Cotswolds 2023 - Duncan and Liz bought a plot in the Cotswolds with plans to build a revolutionary eco home. The cathedral-like structure, consisting of walls of triple-glazed windows and three zig-zagging roofs, will be a technically complex challenge.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Biscuit Week - The competition kicks off with Biscuit Week, and the bakers are challenged to make biscuits that will say something both about them and a place in the British Isles.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tuscany - There's more to Tuscany than Chianti as Gino reveals a very different side of this much visited region, one that is steeped in medieval heritage and culinary customs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: San Sebastian - Nisha Katona takes Fred to San Sebastian for a mind-blowing meal at one of the world's top restaurants, and to visit a tiny sports bar to learn the secrets of the perfect tortilla.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S6 Ep1
programme.desc: The new batch of chefs rely on their patisserie instincts for their first challenge, before transforming the classic banoffee pie. Whose opra aux fruit will hit the high notes?

programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Patrick Stewart, Ralph Fiennes, Bella Ramsey, Dame Joan Collins, Layton Williams and Zak Abel.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2022
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2022!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of Deltoid's Strange Behaviour - Smartysaurus is upset because her best friend, Deltoid, keeps calling her a monster and running away from her. Noddy decides to investigate and find out why Deltoid's behaving so strangely. He soon discovers that Deltoid has lost all his memories and doesn't recognise any of his friends anymore. It takes all Noddy's powers of deduction and gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to realise that Deltoid has lost his memory chip! All he has to do now is stop Deltoid trying to trap Smartysaurus long enough to refit the chip and restore his memories. Good luck Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a raceloser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep11
programme.desc: New Tail - D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove he's still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep11
programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the Tush Twins.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia / Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep37
programme.desc: Family On The Edge - When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep47
programme.desc: Razor's Edge - Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep48
programme.desc: Monsters & Mana - Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep22
programme.desc: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright - When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sherman Exchange Program/Charles Dickens - Sherman trades places with a kid Emperor and learns that being king is harder than it seems and Peabody's new co-host is out of control

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep21
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Four - With all three elemental power gems in hand, Fearless Leader sets out to take over the world. But with every use of the gems, the world becomes more unstable, and theyre heading toward certain destruction

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep22
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter One - Every year, the world turns to Frostbite Falls beloved cat Frostbite Frannie to declare the first day of summer vacation. When Frannie sees her tail, vacations can begin!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep21
programme.desc: Deja Flu / Crackridge Live - It's Archibald to the rescue when Loy, Sage and Finly come down with a bad case of the Dj Flu. Archibald and Cousin Ashley take over the airwaves.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep22
programme.desc: House of the Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.
